title: Morty and the Mousetown Talent Show
subtle: Fantasy (fiction), 1,727 words, Level S (Grade 3), Lexile 870L, Fiction Series
description: Morty is back in another episode of tomfoolery. When Morty's sister makes him mad, he decides to play a trick on her. But when the trick results in an embarrassing moment for his sister, Morty is filled with remorse.
highFrequencyWords: boasted, courtesy, mischievous, odor, remorse, tolerate
reviewWords: Use of vocabulary lessons requires a subscription to VocabularyA-Z.com.
comprehension: Adverbs                : Recognize adverbs used in text
awareness: Compound Words                : Recognize and understand the use of compound words
phonics:
Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
